attributes.action: GP Increase their lack of knowledge regarding Fibromyalgia
attributes.additional_details: Increase GP's understanding of Fibromyalgia. Their knowledge is very limited and this is very distressing and frustrating for the patient. There is a GP disinterest in this subject.  They need to be educated by visiting specialists from around the globe to be able to assist patients instead of looking blank and giving not sufficient support.They are being paid to treat us but we are not being offered the appropriate medication to help us maintain a healthy and balanced lifestyle.
